DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Men woman age 1860 2 . BMI 2128 kg/m2 3 . Stable weight ( variation < 3 kg within 6 month screen visit ) 4 . Ability give inform consent 5 . Ability follow verbal write instruction English 6 . Use medically approve form contraception ( monophasic oral contraception , intra uterine device , surgical sterilization 2 combine barrier method ) 1 . Type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus diagnose accord American Diabetes Association criteria 2 . Coronary heart disease ( history myocardial infarction , unstable angina pectoris , congestive heart failure ) 3 . Uncontrolled hypertension ( BP > 150/90 mmHg antihypertensive medication ) 4 . Dyslipidemia 5 . Tobacco , marijuana intravenous drug use 6 . Shift worker ( night shift alternate day/night shift ) 7 . Recent weight loss ( > 3 kg within 6 month screen visit ) 8 . Gastroparesis 9 . Inflammatory bowel disease 10 . Malignancy treat chemotherapy within past 3 year 11 . History pancreatitis 12 . Depression psychosis 13 . Renal insufficiency ( creatinine clearance < 50 ml/min ) 14 . Transaminases > 2x normal range 15 . Known liver disease 16 . Pregnancy within 6 month screen visit 17 . Lactation 18 . Failure use medically approve contraceptive method 19 . History eat disorder ( anorexia , bulimia laxative abuse ) 20 . History surgery treatment obesity ( gastric banding , gastric bypass , gastric stapling ) 21 . New diagnosis hypo hyperthyroidism within 1 year screen visit 22 . History alcohol abuse within past 5 year 23 . Seizure disorder 24 . Gout 25 . Kidney stone
